architecture: Explore best practices and principles for designing reliable, scalable, and efficient systems in the cloud and on-premises.
aspnet: Discover tips and tricks for developing web applications using the .NET Framework and ASP.NET technologies.
aws: Stay up-to-date with the latest news, tips, and insights on Amazon Web Services (AWS) and learn how to build, deploy, and manage your applications in the cloud.
azure: Get the latest updates and best practices on Microsoft Azure and learn how to build, deploy, and manage your applications in the cloud.
benchmarks: Learn how to benchmark and measure the performance of your applications and infrastructure to optimize and improve their speed and efficiency.
blog: Read our blog to stay up-to-date with the latest news, trends, and insights on software development, cloud computing, and more.
blogging: Discover tips and tricks for creating and managing your own blog, building your online presence, and reaching a wider audience.
clean-code: Explore best practices and techniques for writing clean, maintainable, and high-quality code that is easy to understand and modify.
cncf: Learn about the Cloud Native Computing Foundation (CNCF) and its projects, including Kubernetes, Prometheus, and more.
cookies: Explore the use of cookies in web development and learn how to manage and secure them to improve your users' experience and privacy.
csharp: Discover tips, tricks, and best practices for programming in C#, a popular and powerful programming language for building Windows and web applications.
design patterns: Design patterns are proven solutions to recurring problems in software design. They are best practices in software development that aim to solve specific problems and provide a standard solution that can be used in many different scenarios. Blog posts under this tag will cover popular design patterns, implementation techniques, and their benefits and drawbacks.
devlunch: Join us for Dev Lunch, a weekly video series where we discuss the latest trends, tools, and technologies in software development and DevOps.
devops: Learn how to implement DevOps practices, tools, and methodologies to improve collaboration, automation, and continuous delivery in your organization.
diagnostics: Explore the tools and techniques for diagnosing and troubleshooting issues in your applications and infrastructure.
dotnet: Stay up-to-date with the latest news, tips, and insights on the .NET Framework and learn how to build, deploy, and manage your applications.
expressions: Learn how to use regular expressions to search, match, and manipulate text in your applications and scripts.
fitness: Discover tips, techniques, and best practices for staying healthy and fit while working in the fast-paced and demanding world of software development.
git: Explore the features and capabilities of Git, a popular version control system for managing and collaborating on software development projects.
github: Stay up-to-date with the latest news, tips, and insights on GitHub and learn how to use its features and capabilities for managing your code.
go: Discover tips, tricks, and best practices for programming in Go, a popular and powerful programming language for building high-performance applications.
helm: Learn about Helm, a package manager for Kubernetes, and how it can simplify the deployment and management of your applications.
hugo: Explore Hugo, a popular open-source static site generator, and learn how to use it to build fast, secure, and scalable websites.
iis: Discover tips, tricks, and best practices for configuring and managing Internet Information Services (IIS) for hosting and managing web applications.
java: Stay up-to-date with the latest news, tips, and insights on Java and learn how to build, deploy, and manage your applications on the JVM.
js: Explore best practices and techniques for programming in JavaScript, a popular and powerful programming language for building dynamic web applications.
k6: Learn how to use k6 to load test your applications and APIs. Get insights into writing load test scripts, analyzing results, and integrating k6 into your CI/CD pipeline.
k8s: Stay up to date on the latest news and best practices for Kubernetes, the popular container orchestration system. Topics include deploying applications, scaling, networking, and more.
life: Find inspiration and guidance for living your best life, both inside and outside of work. Topics include productivity, mindfulness, work-life balance, and personal growth.
lifestyle: Discover tips and tricks for living a healthy and happy life, both at work and at home. Topics include fitness, nutrition, mental health, and self-care.
localstack: Learn how to use LocalStack, an open-source tool for simulating cloud services on your local machine. Topics include setting up LocalStack, using it for testing and development, and more.
messaging: Explore messaging and event-driven architectures, including tools and best practices for building scalable, reliable systems that can handle high volumes of data.
moq: Get tips and best practices for using Moq, a popular mocking framework for .NET developers. Topics include setting up Moq, creating mock objects, and writing unit tests.
msmq: Learn about Microsoft Message Queuing (MSMQ), a messaging technology that allows applications to send messages to each other asynchronously. Topics include setting up and configuring MSMQ, message format, and more.
mvc: Stay up to date on the latest tips and best practices for developing with the Model-View-Controller (MVC) pattern. Topics include routing, model binding, filters, and more.
news: Stay up to date on the latest news and trends in technology, including updates on software development tools and frameworks, cloud computing, artificial intelligence, and more.
node: Discover the latest tips, tricks, and best practices in Node.js development. Topics include frameworks like Express and Nest, as well as Node.js-specific techniques like async/await and the event loop.
observed: Get weekly tips and insights on DevOps, AWS, Terraform, and more with Observed, our newsletter. Each edition includes a practical tip you can use to improve your infrastructure and development practices.
openmessage: Learn about OpenMessage, an open-source messaging framework for .NET developers. Topics include setting up and configuring OpenMessage, sending and receiving messages, and more.
page: Find inspiration and guidance for building high-quality web pages and applications. Topics include HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and accessibility.
personal-development: Discover tips and strategies for developing your career, improving your skills, and achieving your personal and professional goals. Topics include networking, mentorship, and personal branding.
powershell: Get tips and best practices for using PowerShell, a powerful command-line shell and scripting language for Windows. Topics include writing scripts, using modules, and managing Windows systems.
public-speaking: Learn tips and best practices for public speaking, including how to overcome nervousness, engage your audience, and create effective presentations.
quick-tips: Get quick tips and tricks for improving your coding, productivity, and development practices. Topics include keyboard shortcuts, time management, and automation.
roundup: Stay up to date on the latest news and trends in software development with our weekly roundup. Each edition includes a curated selection of articles
sap: Get the latest news and insights about SAP software, ERP solutions, SAP HANA and more. Stay up to date on the latest trends in SAP and how they impact your business.
sapb1: Find useful tips, tricks, and news for SAP Business One, an ERP software designed for small and medium-sized enterprises. Learn about the latest features and updates, and how to improve your business processes.
seo: Learn about the latest trends and best practices for search engine optimization (SEO). Get tips and tricks to improve your website's visibility and ranking on search engines like Google and Bing.
service-fabric: Stay up to date on the latest developments and best practices for Service Fabric, a distributed systems platform for building scalable and reliable microservices. Learn how to design, deploy, and manage your microservices architecture.
sql: Stay up to date on the latest trends and best practices for SQL Server, Azure SQL, and other SQL-based databases. Get tips and tricks for performance tuning, security, data management, and more.
testing: Learn about the latest trends and best practices for software testing. Get tips and tricks for automated testing, unit testing, integration testing, and more.
url-rewrite: Learn how to improve your website's search engine optimization (SEO) and user experience with URL rewriting. Get tips and tricks for creating clean, user-friendly URLs that are easy to read and remember.
vb: Stay up to date on the latest developments and best practices for Visual Basic, a programming language developed by Microsoft. Learn how to build Windows desktop applications, web applications, and more.
vsts: Stay up to date on the latest developments and best practices for Visual Studio Team Services (VSTS), a cloud-based collaboration platform for software development teams. Learn how to improve your team's productivity, collaboration, and agility.
xunit: Stay up to date on the latest developments and best practices for xUnit, a popular unit testing framework for .NET languages. Learn how to write effective and maintainable unit tests for your .NET applications.
yarn: Stay up to date on the latest developments and best practices for Yarn, a package manager for JavaScript. Learn how to manage your JavaScript dependencies, improve your build process, and more.
